import { Graphics } from "pixi.js"
import { AnchorContainer } from "sprites/util/AnchorContainer"
import TextSprite from "sprites/game/TextSprite"


export default class TextLabel extends AnchorContainer {

	private _text?: TextSprite
	private _background?: Graphics

	private padding: number

    constructor(text: string, padding: number) {
		super()

		this.anchorX = 0
		this.anchorY = 0.5

		this.padding = padding
		this.setText(text)
    }

	setText(text: string) {
		if (this._text) this.removeChild(this._text)
		if (this._background) this.removeChild(this._background)
		
		this._text = new TextSprite(text, 6, 0, 0)
		this._text.x = this.padding
		this._text.y = this.padding / 2

		this._background = new Graphics()
		this._background.beginFill(0xFFFFFF, 1)
		this._background.drawRoundedRect(
			0, 0, 
			this._text.width + this.padding * 2,
			this._text.height + this.padding,
			4
		)
		this._background.endFill()
		
		this.addChild(this._background)
		this.addChild(this._text)
	}

}
